request.description:
# Login Api Documentation

## Login Admins

Login to the admin panel to control the system.

- **Endpoint:** `/login_admin.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `email` | String | Email address of the admin. |
| `password` | String | Password for the admin. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "password": "StrongPassword123",
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "admin": {
        "a_id": 1,
        "a_first_name": "Mohammed",
        "a_last_name": "El Shora",
        "a_email": "elshora@gmail.com",
        "a_password": "$2y$10$Xx9juMyB.B8pHcQvjoPuZOT7DtBkz2Pqii6TiQEG9TUvbpPEva6m6",
        "a_verified_code": null,//type string
        "a_last_login": "2024-01-25 15:49:11",
        "a_create_at": "2024-01-23 04:56:39"
    }
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the email is incorrect
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "message": "The email you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

or When the password is incorrect

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 401,  
   "message": "Error in password"  
  }

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    You have to fill email and password .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Check Admin verify code Api Documentation

## Check verify code for admins By admin id

Check verify code for admin.

- **Endpoint:** `/check_admin_verify_code.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `adminId` | int | The id of the admin. |
| `code` | String | The code that was sent to the admin. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "adminId": 1,
  "password": "123456",
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "admin": {
        "a_id": 1,
        "a_first_name": "Mohammed",
        "a_last_name": "El Shora",
        "a_email": "elshora@gmail.com",
        "a_password": "$2y$10$Xx9juMyB.B8pHcQvjoPuZOT7DtBkz2Pqii6TiQEG9TUvbpPEva6m6",
        "a_verified_code": null,// always null
        "a_last_login": "2024-01-25 15:49:11",
        "a_create_at": "2024-01-23 04:56:39"
    }
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the id is not exist in database
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "message": "The adminId you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    When the `code` is incorrect
    

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 400,  
   "message": "Invalid verification code"  
  }

 ```

Or you have to fill `adminId` and `code` .. if you don't fill them or when you forgot one of the post body

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Login Api Documentation

## Login users By Email and Password

Login to user account that is no providers.

- **Endpoint:** `/login_user.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `email` | String | Email address of the user. |
| `password` | String | Password for the user. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "password": "StrongPassword123",
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{  
"status": "Success",  
"user": {  
"user_id": 5,  
"user_first_name": "John",  
"user_last_name": "Doe",  
"user_email": "[elshora@gmail.com1](https://mailto:elshora@gmail.com1)",  
"user_password": "$2y$10$2q0T8C1GoqguN9qLFZAXKuJljuc3WkNFIsJqOfLrQiBbcRetdaXba",  
"user_provider": "email_password",  
"user_is_verified": false,  
"user_lastlogin": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_createdat": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_image": null, //type string 
"user_role": "personal_user"  
}  
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the email is incorrect
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "message": "The email you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

or When the password is incorrect

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 401,  
   "message": "Error in password"  
  }

 ```

or if provider is not `'email_password'`

``` json
{  
"status": "Failure",  
"code": 401,  
"message": "User created by another provider"  
}

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    You have to fill email and password .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Login provider Api Documentation

## Login users By social apps

Login to user account or create new one with social.

- **Endpoint:** `/login_provider.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | String | Full name of the user. |
| `email` | String | Email address of the user. |
| `provider` | String | The provider type `google` or `facebook`. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "provider": "facebook"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{  
"status": "Success",  
"user": {  
"user_id": 5,  
"user_first_name": "John",  
"user_last_name": "Doe",  
"user_email": "[elshora@gmail.com1](https://mailto:elshora@gmail.com1)",  
"user_password": "User created by another provider",  
"user_provider": "google",  
"user_is_verified": true, // it always true 
"user_lastlogin": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_createdat": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_image": null, //type string 
"user_role": "personal_user"  // it always personal
}  
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the email is used with a different provider than the one initially registered with
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 401,
  "message": "User created by another provider"
}

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    You have to fill all posts body .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 400,
  "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"
}

 ```

# Sign up Api Documentation

## Create a New User

Creates a new user in the system.

- **Endpoint:** `/create_user.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | String | Full name of the user. |
| `email` | String | Email address of the user. |
| `password` | String | Password for the user. Minimum length: 8 chars. |
| `userRole` | String | Role of the user in the application. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "password": "StrongPassword123",
  "userRole": "admin"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{  
"status": "Success",  
"user": {  
"user_id": 5,  
"user_first_name": "John",  
"user_last_name": "Doe",  
"user_email": "[elshora@gmail.com1](https://mailto:elshora@gmail.com1)",  
"user_password": "$2y$10$2q0T8C1GoqguN9qLFZAXKuJljuc3WkNFIsJqOfLrQiBbcRetdaXba",  
"user_provider": "email_password",  
"user_is_verified": false,  
"user_lastlogin": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_createdat": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_image": null, //type string 
"user_role": "personal_user"  
}  
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 409)**  
    When the email is registered before
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 409,
  "message": "This email already exists"
}

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    When the length of the password is lesser than 8
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 400,
  "message": "The password is very weak"
}

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    You have to fill all posts body .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 400,
  "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"
}

 ```

# Send verify code Api Documentation

## Send verify code for users By user email

Send verify code for user.

- **Endpoint:** `/send_verify_code.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `email` | String | The email address of the user. |
| `verificationType` | String | Should be `create_email` or `forgot_password`. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "email": "elshora@gmail.com",
  "verificationType": "create_email"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{  
"status": "Success",  
"user": {  
"user_id": 3,  
"user_first_name": "John",  
"user_last_name": "Doe",  
"user_email": "[elshora@gmail.com1](https://mailto:elshora@gmail.com1)",  
"user_password": "$2y$10$2q0T8C1GoqguN9qLFZAXKuJljuc3WkNFIsJqOfLrQiBbcRetdaXba",  
"user_provider": "email_password",  
"user_is_verified": true, 
"user_lastlogin": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_createdat": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_image": null, //type string 
"user_role": "personal_user"  
}  
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the id is not exist in database
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "message": "The email you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    When the `verificationType` is not `create_email` or `forgot_password`.
    
    ``` json
    {  
     "status": "Failure",  
     "code": 400,  
     "message": "Invalid verification type."  
    }
    
     ```
    

Or you have to fill `email` and `verificationType` .. if you don't fill them or when you forgot one of the post body

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Check verify code Api Documentation

## Check verify code for users By user id

Check verify code for user.

- **Endpoint:** `/check_verify_code.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `userId` | int | The id of the user. |
| `code` | String | The code that was sent to the user is less than an hour ago. |
| `verificationType` | String | Should be `create_email` or `forgot_password`. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "userId": 3,
  "code": "123456",
  "verificationType": "create_email",
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{  
"status": "Success",  
"user": {  
"user_id": 3,  
"user_first_name": "John",  
"user_last_name": "Doe",  
"user_email": "[elshora@gmail.com1](https://mailto:elshora@gmail.com1)",  
"user_password": "$2y$10$2q0T8C1GoqguN9qLFZAXKuJljuc3WkNFIsJqOfLrQiBbcRetdaXba",  
"user_provider": "email_password",  
"user_is_verified": true, // always true 
"user_lastlogin": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_createdat": "2024-01-25 05:38:50",  
"user_image": null, //type string 
"user_role": "personal_user"  
}  
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the id is not exist in database
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "message": "The userId you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    When the `code` is incorrect
    

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 400,  
   "message": "Invalid verification code"  
  }

 ```

Or when the `code` was sent more than an hour ago.

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 400,  
   "message": "The verification code has expired. we sent another code"  
  }

 ```

Or when the `verificationType` is not `create_email` or `forgot_password`.

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 400,  
   "message": "Invalid verification type."  
  }

 ```

Or you have to fill `userId` ,`verificationType` and `code` .. if you don't fill them or when you forgot one of the post body

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```
